price: (Saa agyidiefoͻ) wei nom ho na mokaa ntam sε: “Nyankopͻn mfa N’ahummͻborͻ ngu wͻn soͻ no?” (Yεbεka akyerε agyidiefoͻ no sε): “Monwura ͻsoro Aheman no mu; suro biara nni mo so na mowerε nso nho”.
arabic: أَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَقۡسَمۡتُمۡ لَا يَنَالُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِرَحۡمَةٍۚ ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ تَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ahāulāi alladhīna aqsamtum lā yanāluhumu al-lahu biraḥmatin ud'khulū al-janata lā khawfun ʿalaykum walā antum taḥzanūna
